import React from 'react'; import './Header.css'; import SearchIcon from '@material-ui/icons/Search'; import ShoppingBasketIcon from '@material-ui/icons/ShoppingBasket'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useStateValue } from '../StateProvider'; function Header() { const [ {cart} ] = useStateValue(); return (
Hello User SignIn

{cart?.length}
) } export default Header
